results.title: Hong Kong Superman
results.overview: Hong Kong Superman is a Hong Kong Martial Arts movie starring Sammo Hung.

results.title: Goldface, the Fantastic Superman
results.overview: Goldface fights dr. Cobra's, aided by a bare chested African named Kotar. When Kotar's not punching folks, he's eating peanuts, bugging out his eyes, and speaking gibberish while referring to Goldy as "B'wana".

results.title: I Am Superman
results.overview: A fighting pitbull finds itself on a strange and unexpected journey that will ultimately decide its fate.

results.title: Attack from Space
results.overview: The superhero Starman is sent by the Emerald Planet to protect Earth from belligerent aliens from the Sapphire Galaxy. The Sapphireans (or "Spherions") kidnap Dr. Yamanaka and force him to use his spaceship against the Earth.

results.title: Superman Super Villains : Bizarro
results.overview: A cloning experiment gone wrong courtesy of Lex Luther, Bizarro now wanders the earth wreaking havoc with all the powers of Superman but none of the goodwill. More misguided than malevolent, Bizarro wages a twisted war against Superman who he sees as an impostor and a threat. Superman will have his hands full as Bizarro runs amok in these three thrilling adventures., This collection of three episodes from the animated Superman series focuses on his nemesis Bizarro. Included are the installments IDENTITY CRISIS, BIZARRO'S WORLD, and LITTLE BIG HEAD MAN.

results.title: Superman Super Villains : Metallo
results.overview: Driven by revenge, Metallo wants nothing more than to destroy Superman. Possessing an indestructible allow boy powered by a heart of Kryptonite, Metallo is one of the Man of Steel's most brutal, explosive villains. So get ready for three of the biggest battles Superman has yet to face. First, witness the birth of Metallo in The Way Of All Flesh as mercenary John Corben, once seemingly invincible, is brought to his knees by a crippling disease. In a desperate attempt for a new lease on life, Corben agrees for his mind to be transplanted into a metal android skeleton by none other than Lex Luthor. Then a loss of memory allows Metallo to play the hero in Action Figures, but playtime is over when Superman's appearance bring back the true monster inside. In Superman's Pal, Jimmy Olsen is bait to lure Superman into a trap with deadly consequences. It's a collision of metal and mayhem that will leave you cheering for more!

results.title: The Iraqi Superman
results.overview: A tormented young man constructs an ingenious devise to rescue his father from Abu Ghraib prison. What he finds there is far from his expectations, revealing the mistreatment and torture of prisoners. His hopes and dreams for a brighter future are dashed upon finding his father.

results.title: Ultimate Superman Collection
results.overview: This is a compilation of older and current Superman Feature Films.

results.title: Superman: The Lost Episodes
results.overview: Superman - The Lost Episodes were produced after the demise of Fleischer Studios and the exit of Dave Fleischer. Unlike the first nine episodes (Max Fleischer's Superman) these eight are far more modern. They were all produced in Famous Studios' New York facilities. They are among the best animation ever created. Seen here in fully restored color, prepare yourself for the ride of your life!

results.title: Superman: Learning to Fly
results.overview: Documentary on the creation of the animated series.

results.title: Spider-Man - Once Upon a Time the Super Heroes
results.original_title: De Superman à Spider-Man: L'aventure des super-héros
results.overview: A documentary about the history of Marvel comics.
